content: SI-AT-22 Adaptive Torque Module Accessory for cordless impact wrenches to automate fastener pre-tensioning in line with approvals (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for impact drivers and wrenches- - ### FEATURES:Features Up to 30% faster than a torque wrench – add the Adaptive Torque Module to a compatible to cordless impact wrench to save time on every single fastening, while remaining in line with ETA stud anchor approvals Correct installation made easier – tell the Adaptive Torque Module what fasteners you’re working with by scanning the box using the built-in barcode scanner, then the module delivers the targeted pre-tension every time you pull the trigger Not only for concrete anchors – use Adaptive Torque Modules with a wide range of wedge anchors, metal bolting, cast-in channels and MEP support structures Ready for inspection – documentation of executed fastenings can be converted to reports using the Adaptive Torque Documentation software for better accountability and back-office efficiency Up to 30% faster than a torque wrench – add the Adaptive Torque Module to a compatible to cordless impact wrench to save time on every single fastening, while remaining in line with approvals Applications Installing T-bolts in HAC-V and HAC-C cast-in anchor channels for fastening curtain wall facades, elevators and MEP installations Assembling MI, MQ, MIQ and MT modular support systems using compatible connectors Setting of compatible Hilti wedge anchors (e.g. KB1, KB3, KB-TZ2, and HSL4) up to 3/4” in concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Adaptive torque modules Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 0.5 lb.
